item.description:
Do you like movies and/or books and want to get some new ones for free? Want to try a new Mexican restaurant in Boston that was voted Best Mexican Food by Bon Appetit magazine? Then join us for dinner, drinks and a DVD/book swap.

We will be enjoying dinner in a private room, then swapping both books and DVDs- you can bring either or both. You can bring bring a few books/movies with you. Please be aware that once you swap items, your original items will not be returned to you. If you bring books, then you will swap for books- if you bring movies, then you will swap for another movie. The swap is optional, you can always join us for dinner.

Please no adult movies, burned movies, exercise dvds or textbooks. Books may be hardcover or paperback, but must be in excellent condition.

La Verdad is run by renowned chef Ken Oringer. Prices are reasonable.
Please note there is NO home Red Sox game on this evening, so parking/transportation should be easy.

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. This is a joint event with the Metrowest Young Professionals group. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside private room, if need to call 774 232 0000
item.name: Delightful Dinner, Delicious Drinks, DVDs and Books!
